PhoceaTravel.name: Phocéa Travel
PhoceaTravel.subtitle: Responsive website for a travel agency
descriptions: Phocéa Travel is a small company offering a vacation planning tool!
Its website allows users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice.
Accommodations can also be filtered by theme, such as budget or ambiance.
skills: Integrate content according to a template
Implement a responsive interface
improvements: Add a database to turn the static website into a modern dynamic app
Link the website to google maps API to show the location of the accommodations
Add a login system to allow users to book accommodations

OhMyFood.name: OhMyFood
OhMyFood.subtitle: Dynamizing a web page with CSS animations
descriptions: Ohmyfood! is a young startup that would like to impose itself on the restaurant market.
The objective is to develop a 100% mobile website that lists the menus of gourmet restaurants.
In addition to the classic reservation systems, customers will be able to compose the menu of their meal so that the dishes are ready when they arrive.
skills: Implementing advanced graphic CSS effects
Using a version management system for project tracking and hosting
Ensuring the graphic coherence of a website
Setting up a Front-End environment
Setting up a navigation structure for a website
Using a version management system for project monitoring and hosting
improvements: Create a login system to allow users to save their favorite restaurants
Create a system to book reservations
Create a restaurant access for them to manage their own menu

LaChouetteAgence.name: La Chouette Agence
LaChouetteAgence.subtitle: Optimization of an existing website
descriptions: La chouette agence is a large web design agency based in Lyon, France.
Due to SEO problems, the website was only on the second page of search engines.
An SEO optimization was therefore performed and an improvement of the website's code in order to correct the display errors and improve the website's accessibility.
skills: Optimizing the size and speed of a website
Ensuring the accessibility of a website
Optimizing the referencing of a website
Researching best practices in web development
Writing maintainable HTML and CSS code
improvements: Modify the format of the different images to improve speed and size

Kanap.name: Kanap
Kanap.subtitle: Building an e-commerce website in JavaScript
descriptions: Kanap is a sofa brand that sells its products exclusively from its store.
Today, the company wanted to have an e-commerce platform in addition to its physical store to sell its products on the Internet.
skills: Validating data from external sources
Managing JavaScript events
Creating a test plan for an application
Interacting with a web service using JavaScript
improvements: Create a login system to allow users to save their favorite products
Create a login system to allow users to modify and/or keep track of their order

Piiquante.name: Piiquante
Piiquante.subtitle: Building an API for a food review application
descriptions: Piiquante is a hot sauce company that wants to develop a hot sauce review web application called 'Hot Takes'.

While Piiquante's product manager hopes to eventually turn the review application into an online store, she wants the first version to be a 'sauce gallery' that allows users to upload their favorite hot sauces and to like or dislike the sauces that others share.
skills: Implement a logical data model in accordance with regulations
Implement CRUD operations in a secure manner
Store data in a secure manner
improvements: Create an online store to allow users to buy hot sauces
Modify the code to prevent users from leaving the app on refresh

Groupomania.name: Groupomania
Groupomania.subtitle: Creation of a company social network
descriptions: Groupomania is a group specialized in mass distribution.
The project consists in building an internal social network for the employees of Groupomania.
The goal of this tool is to facilitate interactions between colleagues.
skills: Authenticating a user and maintaining their session
Managing a data store using SQL
Implementing secure data storage using SQL
Customize the content sent to a web client
improvements: Change the comment system to a nested one to allow for replies
Implement a system to resize user's profile picture

description: I am Jérôme, a professional and passionate developer based in the south of France.
Over the years, my curiosity led me to explore different aspects of new technologies including 2 years as ambassador for Microsoft France (Microsoft’s “House of Fans” program).
After a career in the banking sector, where I acquired and sharpened my listening skills, my flexibility and my rigor, I decided to get back to my true passion: coding.

With great determination, I went back to school to finally get certificated in Web Development.  Throughout this journey, I carried out multiple professional projects in perfect autonomy and precision.
At this moment, I am tenaciously looking to put my diverse and rich background at the service of ambitious and challenging projects.
Thanks to the manifold projects I have worked on, I have been able to manage both the front and the back end, giving me as global vision of the development of a web application.
My goal is to create a clean and sharp code that generates a web app that is both accessible, user-friendly and performing.
If you would like to know more about me and my projects feel free to contact me!
